backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing unique inquiries in a Set, allowing submission and retrieval while preventing duplicates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature changes, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with extensive OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, title, description, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all marketing sections with header and footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with branding, navigation links, service list, contact links, and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header providing logo, navigation, email/WhatsApp CTAs, and a mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section with inquiry form, validation, status handling, and submission via a React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqSec: Renders a FAQ section with an accordion listing preset questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Displays the hero banner with headline, call‑to‑action buttons, and an illustration.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Shows a five‑step visual process flow with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists service offerings as cards with icons, descriptions, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiryMutat: Defines a mutation that submits an inquiry through the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom warm‑tone theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/inquiryLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and email inquiry links with prefilled messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, color tokens, animations, and plugin support.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, existing features, and the goal of building a modern business-focused marketing website.
